snippet: Leveraged exchange-traded funds, designed to magnify short-term returns, have fallen out of favor this year as investors who had embraced them are finding costs excessive in a calm market that is not rewarding bets on wild daily swings....

headline.print_headline: Leveraged ETFs, Lovers of Market Waves, Lose Favor Amid the Calm
headline.main: Leveraged ETFs, Lovers of Market Waves, Lose Favor Amid the Calm

lead_paragraph: Leveraged exchange-traded funds, designed to magnify short-term returns, have fallen out of favor this year as investors who had embraced them are finding costs excessive in a calm market that is not rewarding bets on wild daily swings.
